name: Jesus
notes: Messiah; Son of David, Son of Abraham.

legal_line_through_joseph.name: Joseph
legal_line_through_joseph.notes: Legal father of Jesus; descendant of David through Solomon.

children.name: Davidic line (royal)
children.notes: From David through Solomon to the exilic and post-exilic heirs.

children.name: Solomon
children.notes: Son of David and Bathsheba; king noted for wisdom.

line_through_mary.name: Mary
line_through_mary.notes: Mother of Jesus; likely from David through Nathan (per Luke).

children.name: Davidic line (Nathan)
children.notes: From David through Nathan to Heli (associated with Mary).

children.name: Nathan
children.notes: Son of David distinct from Solomon.
